title: 5/26/17 - Society is laughing at political correctness
description:
Dr. Tom Coburn discusses The Article V solution and The Convention of States Project ...'Written in letters of gold'...How a convention of states could've stopped The US Civil War ...Bill O'Reilly spends the hour with Glenn and discusses the events of this past week and the ratings collapse at Fox News we're seeing in his absence ...What's next in the war on terror after Manchester? ...Time to drop the Trump/Russia investigation? ...Climate change causes child marriage? ...Mr. Buzzkill Stu ...Falling in love...with a 7 year old? Blame climate change.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
